mapper.select: SELECT * FROM item_time_condition WHERE item_code = #{itemCode} ORDER BY closing_time DESC LIMIT 1

select c.item_name,t.execution_price ,t.volume, t.execution_price-d.end_price as change_amount, ROUND((t.execution_price-d.end_price)/d.end_price*100,1) as change_rate from item_time_condition as t, item_code as c, item_day_condition as d where t.item_code = c.item_code and c.item_code = d.item_code and (t.item_code, t.closing_time) in ( select item_code, max(closing_time) from item_time_condition group by item_code) and ( d.item_code, d.present) in ( select item_code, max(present) from item_day_condition group by item_code) order by t.volume desc LIMIT 10
